channel.title: What have you run vista on?
channel.description:
What have you run vista on?
So far I have run vista on my desktop, old laptop, and even older laptop (current one)
My "even older laptop" has the following specs: -256mb ram -plug in cdrom -80gb hdd -700mhz piii -wifi card
and its running vista ultimate with no lag!

item.title: What have you run vista on?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:1, topic:221837”]What have you run vista on?

So far I have run vista on my desktop, old laptop, and even older laptop (current one)

My “even older laptop” has the following specs:
-256mb ram
-plug in cdrom
-80gb hdd
-700mhz piii
-wifi card

and its running vista ultimate with no lag![/quote]
No lag? i guess you’ve been used to shit computers all ur life to think that 256mb could run fine on vista. I had 1gb and 2.5ghz on vista and it was slow as hell.

Read full topic
item.source: What have you run vista on?

item.title: What have you run vista on?
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:
@supamagier wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:3, topic:221837”][quote author=supamagier link=topic=291314.msg2347684#msg2347684 date=1216802282]
Why the hell you choose vista? Windows is better, and is less slow. Now yours is probably just fast because you have barely anything on it.
[/quote]
Vista is windows? And I know how to get them for free? And I also have XP[/quote]
Talking about XP. Why would you choose Vista if you can have XP.
